title: HELP! Dragged back to elo hell through a glitch!?

embed.description: League of Legends (LoL) Summoner data for Sleepah in North America. Contains statistics, match data and more to help players analyze and improve performance.

body: I have not played ranked since s4,  I start it up, win 3, lose 1, win my last one, in between the 3rd win and my **only** loss i dodged a **LOBBY** who was filled with flaming teammates who were already saying they would forcefeed / lose us the game intentionally-   Because i didint know about the apparent new change to the game were 1 dodge gets you a loss of promos?! like really riot?  I won 3 in a row, lost 1, won my last, and i get sent back to elo hell. Thats not fair in the slightest i want my rank!

replies.body:
It's definitely frustrating to have been hit with a loss after you dodge a game. Especially when your teammates in that game claimed they were going to feed intentionally. The best case scenario for those types of situations is to stay calm and report them for feeding if that is case. 

Leaving promo matches does get you hit with a loss since people could abuse the ability to dodge matches for 'better' teams. Our [Queue Dodge FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) goes over all the penalties if someone was to dodge their promo matches.
